item.title: Vulnerability Lists, Databases and Scoring
item.description: In this post I wanted to go over some of the findings I have found when doing research into how vulnerability scoring works with vulnerability databases. CVE List The Common Enumeration of Vulnerabilities (CVE) List is a database of reported vulnerabilities maintained by the Mitre Corporation. Vulnerabilities found can be submitted by organizations and even individuals. Each vulnerability is given a CVE-ID number to identify by. This list of CVE-ID’s is used by many other databases for application use and scoring.

item.title: The BASpi - A Configurable BACnet Raspberry Pi Hat
item.description: The BASpi is a raspberry pi HAT that can turn your raspbery pi into a configurable BACnet device. BACnet devices are used in commercial HVAC building automation. It is how large commercial buildings are able to trigger during a certain time of day or trigger from another sensor. For example, a BACnet devices can be used for turning down and turning up building air conditioning during certain times of day or year.
